body:
The point shop went baibai, what should we replace it with? Post your suggestions.

I personally think  a water bucketwould be cool.

title: To fill the empty slot.

replies.body: Add it back, with golden apples, arrows and maybe being able to upgrade ur bow to punch/power I. Probably speed and like 3 dias aswell.
